name: Plane VS Zombie
description:
UPDATE 1.1

FIX COLLIDER

You live as an air force military in an apocalyptic world. Your mission is to save the citizen from the building and shoot all the zombies. Survive as long as you can soldier! We believe in ya!

Plane vs Zombies is a flappy bird inspired game, you play as a jet plane. The game has 3 different map and also 3 different skin.
